name: Tennr
headline: Turn your healthcare operations into growth
description: Tennr is a first-of-its-kind automations platform built to handle the nuances of human-decision making within healthcare operations.

founders.name: Trey Holterman, Founder
founders.description:
Former All-American rower, Computer science major and TA before going to work as a Software engineer at Strava. Left Strava to start a company with my former teammate Diego and former roommate Tyler. 

Outside of work, (pre-startup) I did standup whenever I had time

founders.name: Diego Baugh, Founder
founders.description:
Built cool things in undergrad. Then discovered a love for design — turns out I generally like the process of finding patterns — helps me in work and in poker. Also, software should probably be less painful to use than it is ;)

Rowed in college, now living in NYC.

founders.name: Tyler Johnson, Founder
founders.description: Tyler is the co-founder and CTO at Tennr. He met his co-founders, Trey and Diego, while studying at Stanford, and spent a year working in technical consulting before leaving to work with them. A dedicated midwesterner, he lives in Wisconsin with a lot of dogs!

raw_markdown='Still drowning in portals & phone trees? You don’t have to be. Register for [Tennr Refresh](https://www.tennr.com/</webinars/the-q1-tennr-refresh>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/672a39051775c7ca53cf861d_TennrLogo_Alpha_Black-ezgif.com-resize.gif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/672a39477b59787741028ffb_c.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/672a371f8afa853ba5f9c4ab_671677f4cfdd2070d81a321a_logo%201.svg)](https://www.tennr.com/</>)[Product](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)[Customer Stories](https://www.tennr.com/</case-study>)[About Us](https://www.tennr.com/</about-tennr>)[Book a Demo](https://www.tennr.com/</demo>)[Book a Demo](https://www.tennr.com/</demo>)
## Turn paperwork into your patient advantage
RaeLM™ is a proprietary vision language model trained on over 4 million medical documents, 230 million data fields, 8,000 page classifications, and 2 billion checkboxes — making it the highest performing document reasoning model in healthcare.‍Tennr is the automation platform that puts RaeLM™ to work for healthcare.
[Book a Demo](https://www.tennr.com/</demo>)

### The Intelligent Automation Platform For Healthcare Ops
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/670fc861662cf86774ffde41_Frame%2030.svg)
Drive Better Service
Process new patients in 10 minutes instead of 10 days.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/670fc861c0ba7d9b8afd66f6_Frame%2030-1.svg)
Automate Upstream and Reduce First-Time Denials by 98%
Catch missing or incorrect documentation upfront to set your billing team up for success.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/670fc86160c9eb3992154166_Frame%2030-2.svg)
Grow and Operate with 1/10 the Headcount
Your best processor isn’t a microchip, it’s Michael. And it’s STILL illegal to clone him (in the US). Tennr lets your team do more with less.
[Learn More](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)
### Genuine Results from Our Customers
“ Before Tennr, we could only work at the speed of our man power Adding Tennr has allowed us to expedite patient access to care and reallocate staff to patient-facing tasks...”
Cal Critchfield
Area Senior Vice President, MGA Homecare
[Read Case Study](https://www.tennr.com/</case-study/mga>)
“Tennr’s automation has completely transformed our workflow. We’re now processing new patients in a fraction of the time it used to take, which has been a game-changer for our team.”
Darius Reid
EVP of Sales, Total Medical Supply
[Read Case Study](https://www.tennr.com/</case-study/total-medical-supply>)
"At my former company, we would manually take the information off of the faxes, then type it in, then press the button, and it would use RPA to put it in the EMR system. Tennr was that… times ten."
Rob Bovee
VP Operations, BetterNight
[Read Case Study](https://www.tennr.com/</case-study/betternight>)
"This technology is a godsend. I will never go back. Over my dead body."
Mike Austin
President, Quality DME
### The All-in-One Intelligent Automation Platform ‍Built for Healthcare
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/671468fce6e7559ec0399992_Frame%2050.png)Wrangle, label, and triage every document](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)[Create Charts and Orders automatically![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/671462ca0ea5af194aa783fc_chart.png)](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)[Qualify patients, lower denials rate![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/671459007774278f2606dd13_Group%2049.png)](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)
[Check Benefits and Prior-Auth in one place![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67145511188a12cb8927553e_eb%20check.png)](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)[Streamline patient and provider communications![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/671461f34224d988f1c49d2f_missing%20info.png)](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)
### Automate Your Workflows End-to-End
1
**Classify**
Whether it's new or existing patient information, we classify and make sure it gets routed appropriately.
[Learn more](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162a926bcaf66efd351247_Classify%20Documents.webp)
2
Intake
We immediately extract the right information and get intake right—so you get paid. We integrate with your EHR, so you never have to do manual data entry again.
[Learn more](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162a925755ed13d216b906_Intake.webp)
3
Request Missing Information
When information is missing, we enable your team to automatically fax or call to request what’s necessary.
[Learn more](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162b6d3bf38465daabd886_Request%20Missing%20Info%20\(1\).webp)
4
Determine Eligibility
Is this patient eligible to receive care? Is Prior Auth needed? We’ll let you know instantly.
[Learn more](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162a92ec8c1739f9409405_Request%20Missing%20Info.webp)
5
Seek Prior Authorization
We’ll send the insurance forms, fill out the portals, and handle calling.
[Learn more](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162a923af9992090c0b3d6_Prior%20Auth.webp)
6
Approve
Our machines are good, but your best teammate is great. You can review and approve anything before we send or submit. 97% of the time, no human needs to be involved.
[Learn more](https://www.tennr.com/</product>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162a92afb5eec3cc914ff9_Approve.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162a926bcaf66efd351247_Classify%20Documents.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162a925755ed13d216b906_Intake.webp)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162a923af9992090c0b3d6_Prior%20Auth.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/67162a92afb5eec3cc914ff9_Approve.webp)
### Only have 2 minutes? Watch this.
### Learn how we've helped these businesses scale their operations.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657ba940783683b352ef52e8/66f2cf4c853788a8bd658254_mpower.webp)MPower HealthMPOWERHealth elevates healthcare delivery by enhancing quality, safety, and efficiency across clinical services. Partnering with over 400 surgeons and 300+ facilities across 23 states, they support more than 50,000 surgeries annually. Their comprehensive services—including intraoperative neuromonitoring (IONM) and Surgical First Assist—are driven by a highly skilled clinical team, advanced technology, and robust data analytics. Through their unwavering commitment to innovation and excellence, MPOWERHealth sets the standard for superior surgical outcomes, empowering healthcare providers to deliver the highest level of care.Read Case Study](https://www.tennr.com/</case-study/mpower-health>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657ba940783683b352ef52e8/6786f640274bd08492e0cbd8_TMS%20LOGO%20TRANSPARENT.webp)Total Medical SupplyHeadquartered in Texarkana, Texas, Total Medical Supply provides doctors and patients in 48 states with the highest quality service and medical supplies on the market. From oral supplements to diabetes management supplies, TMS specializes in getting you what you need to make every day better than the last.Read Case Study](https://www.tennr.com/</case-study/total-medical-supply>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/657ba940783683b352ef52e8/66bb7476504a3275532603ca_TSM%20logo.png)Total Sleep ManagementTotal Sleep Management, a sleep disorders center based in Longwood, FL, provides sleep-related diagnostic and treatment services with the talents of specialized physicians, state-of-the-art technology, and the latest in sleep disorder therapies. All patients are referred by their primary care physicians.Read Case Study](https://www.tennr.com/</case-study/total-sleep-management>)
### Some content for you
![The Q4 Tennr Refresh](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/6788bca0acfa079eaa84dd0c_The%20Smoke%20and%20Mirrors%20of%20%E2%80%9CAI%E2%80%9D.webp)
WEBINAR
#### The Q4 Tennr Refresh
Why is it such a pain to get a patient quickly seen after being sent over by a referring provider? And why does every ‘AI’ demo look amazing but never seem to work in practice?
[Watch](https://www.tennr.com/<https:/info.tennr.com/refresh-form>)
![The Smoke and Mirrors of AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/6788bca059ed98fc94a25f2f_The%20Q4%20Tennr%20Refresh%20\(1\).webp)
KEYNOTE
#### The Smoke and Mirrors of “AI”
Why is it such a pain to get a patient quickly seen after being sent over by a referring provider? And why does every ‘AI’ demo look amazing but never seem to work in practice?
[Watch](https://www.tennr.com/<https:/vimeo.com/1044738934?share=copy#t=0>)
![Tennr Builds Specialized Language Models on AWS](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6572b9fac31d6c6617f0a29c/6788bca03bcd2d0dbc9a2bda_Tennr%20Builds%20Specialized%20Language%20Models%20on%20AWS.webp)
VIDEO
#### Tennr Builds Specialized Language Models on AWS
Using specialized language models, Tennr can read documents in any format, extract the critical information, and write a new document to help customers automate the tedious work effort.
[Watch](https://www.tennr.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=pKWXvrGW8rw>)
### Read more about Tennr

Ready to do more with less?

Through their unwavering commitment to innovation and excellence, MPOWERHealth sets the standard for superior surgical outcomes, empowering healthcare providers to deliver the highest level of care.Read Case Study](https://www.tennr.com/</case-study/mpower-health>)

![⟨17⟩Total Sleep ManagementTotal Sleep Management, a sleep disorders center based in Longwood, FL, provides sleep-related diagnostic and treatment services with the talents of specialized physicians, state-of-the-art technology, and the latest in sleep disorder therapies. generated_description:
**Company Overview: Tennr**

Founded in 2021 and based in New York, Tennr is a pioneering automation platform focused on optimizing healthcare operations—essentially turning cumbersome processes into engines for growth. Tackling the inefficiencies that plague the healthcare system, Tennr is on a mission to streamline operations so healthcare providers can focus on what truly matters: patient care.

### Key Features

Tennr stands out with its proprietary technology called RaeLM™, a vision language model trained on an impressive dataset of over 4 million medical documents and 230 million data fields. This sophisticated model is designed to understand the intricacies of healthcare documentation, making it a powerful tool for automating tasks that typically require human decision-making.

The platform offers a suite of features that help healthcare operations:
- **Rapid Patient Processing:** New patients can be registered in just 10 minutes, a stark improvement over the traditional 10-day timeline.
- **Reduction of Billing Denials:** By catching missing or incorrect documentation upfront, Tennr enables billing teams to work more efficiently, reducing first-time denials by 98%.
- **Workforce Optimization:** Tennr allows healthcare teams to operate with a fraction of the headcount, significantly increasing productivity without sacrificing quality.

### Customer Impact

Tennr is already making waves in the healthcare sector, with testimonials underscoring its transformative impact:
- **Efficiency Gains:** Healthcare leaders report that Tennr has expedited patient access to care and allowed staff to focus on patient-facing tasks.
- **Operational Transformation:** Customers have noted that the automation provided by Tennr revolutionizes their workflows, greatly reducing processing times.

### The Team and Support

With a workforce of 44 employees, Tennr is currently part of Y Combinator's Batch W23 and is guided by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer. Their focus on innovation and customer-centric solutions positions Tennr not just as a tool but as a partner in the healthcare ecosystem.

### Why It Matters

If you're finding yourself bogged down by portals, phone trees, or paperwork, Tennr promises a way out. By implementing their cutting-edge automation solutions, healthcare operations can transition from reactive to proactive management, ultimately enhancing patient care and streamlining administrative burdens.

For those looking to learn more or experience Tennr's solutions firsthand, they offer demos and ongoing webinars, like the recent *Tennr Refresh* series.

Want to explore how you can turn your operations into growth? [Check out Tennr](https://www.tennr.com) and discover the future of healthcare automation.
